summary: Encapsulates a MODFLOW‑6 groundwater model, managing its spatial domain, hydraulic properties, and the collection of MODFLOW packages. Provides utilities for initializing, updating, validating, and rendering the model, as well as for spatial operations such as clipping, regridding, and splitting, and for handling time handling and output generation.
business_intent: Enable scientists and engineers to programmatically build, modify, and run MODFLOW‑6 simulations within a Python workflow, while offering convenient tools for model preprocessing, quality checks, and post‑processing.
